job.title: .Net Engineer - Javascript/SQL/Angular - Great Team!!
job.description: If you are a .Net Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience, please read on! .Net Software Engineer Chattanooga TN - Onsite team $85K - $100K BS Computer Science/ Engineering/ IT with 3+ years of IT Development Experience  This would be an amazing opportunity for you if you are looking to join a growing dynamic team. What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position What's In It for You So, if you are a Software Engineer with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Jenn.Parrella@CyberCoders.com Jenn Parrella - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
